name: Rillaboom
description: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.

attacks.name: Drum Roll
attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Drum Beating
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can’t use Drum Beating.
